packages.title: Edinburgh Castle
packages.description: Edinburgh Castle Visit Edinburgh's famous castle for a great family day out in Scotland. Book tickets through Fog Of Explore for a guaranteed entry.

packages.title: National Museum of Scotland
packages.description: National Museum of Scotland, we care for collections of national and international importance. Book tickets through Fog Of Explore and get fast track access.

packages.title: Palace of Holyroodhouse
packages.description: Palace of Holyroodhouse is the Queen's official residence in Edinburgh and the home of Scottish royal history. Book tickets through Fog Of Explore and get fast track access.
